EmailTemplate.subject: It’s simple to secure what you need
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Do you send out quote requests because it’s just part of your process? Do you email sellers because they never post prices? Do you use a telephone to place an order?
92% of consumers do business online.
Every time you need an aerospace part, check GoDirect Trade first. It takes a second to search and sixty seconds to check out.
Our marketplace has been featured in Forbes <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/U0r000X0qI0QG602MZ000X0]]>, The Wall Street Journal <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/a0200q0M0Q0000sXYIZ600G]]> and Harvard Business Review <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/CI000t0Zq06Q0ZG0200MX00]]> and is rapidly moving from “small startup” to “major disruptor”. Purchase your parts online and you will never want to do it “the old way” ever again. SEARCH NOW <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Buy_More]]> Stay Safe,
Lisa Butters General Manager GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Buy_More]]> (powered by Honeywell)
